sn55.50:1: "Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Katamāni cattāri? Sappurisasaṁsevo, saddhammassavanaṁ, yonisomanasikāro, dhammānudhammappaṭipatti – imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgānī"ti.
sn55.50:2: Abhisandā tayo vuttā,Duve mahaddhanena ca;Suddhaṁ nandiyaṁ bhaddiyaṁ,Mahānāmaṅgena te dasāti.
